title: Biden warns against 'backward slide' in democracy around the globe at outset of two-day summit
content:
1. Biden warns against 'backward slide' in democracy around the globe at outset of two-day summit  The Washington Post

localize.title: バイデン氏、2日間のサミット開催にあたり、世界の民主主義の「後退」に警鐘を鳴らす
